name: The Last Knight (Mr.P1nk)
description:
General description:

The Last Knight is a short debut RPG Maker project made by a small passionate team of 3 friends. You play as Knight, a stone-cold hero tasked with restoring peace to the Kingdom. On your journey you will encounter various friends and foes to spice up your combat filled adventure. 

Features:

-mouse drawn pixel art

-engaging turn based combat system

-the ability to murder various creatures

-mystically diverse world

Credits:

-Direction and Art: bep(is) SugarFree The Second

-Production and Writing: Mr. Pink

-Tilesets: Aritos

-Plugins used: in the game's credits

All feedback appreciated and encouraged. (also thanks for playing if you did)
